subject: TechCrunch Daily: OpenAI unveils new partnership, Meta's AR glasses leak

body.text:
TechCrunch Daily
January 15, 2025

Good afternoon! Here are today's top tech stories:

TOP STORIES

1. OpenAI Announces Strategic Partnership with Healthcare Giant
The AI company is bringing GPT-5 to medical diagnostics, raising both excitement and ethical concerns.
Read more: https://techcrunch.com/2025/01/15/openai-healthcare-partnership

2. Meta's Next-Gen AR Glasses Leaked in Internal Documents
Photos reveal a sleek design that could finally make AR mainstream.
Read more: https://techcrunch.com/2025/01/15/meta-ar-glasses-leak

3. Tesla's Self-Driving Software Gets Major Update
FSD v12.5 promises better city navigation and reduced intervention rates.
Read more: https://techcrunch.com/2025/01/15/tesla-fsd-update

STARTUP NEWS

• Climate tech startup raises $50M Series B
• New Y Combinator batch announced
• Fintech unicorn plans 2025 IPO

VENTURE CAPITAL

• Sequoia leads $100M round for AI infrastructure company
• Andreessen Horowitz doubles down on crypto investments

EVENTS

Join us at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 in San Francisco
September 15-17, 2025
Early bird tickets: https://techcrunch.com/events/disrupt-2025

---

You're receiving TechCrunch Daily because you subscribed at techcrunch.com

Manage your newsletter preferences:
https://techcrunch.com/newsletters/preferences
